message: Let's start fair. I'll take 90%, you get 10%.  We can negotiate further if you'd like.
Alice, let's be realistic. I'm proposing a 70/30 split in my favor.  Time is money, and quite literally so in this game. Don't let it slip away.
I'm willing to compromise, but 70/30 is too much in your favor. Let's split it 60/40.  We both get a decent amount, and we can move on to the next round.
Alice, I appreciate the compromise, but let's meet in the middle.  65/35 is my final offer.  The clock is ticking!
